snippet.title: Fall Guys Free for All Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-register NOW at https://www.epicgames.com/fallguys/en-US/free-for-all-pre-registration

Can you believe it beans? We’re so excited to share that from June 21, you’ll be able to play Fall Guys for free on all platforms—including the introduction of Nintendo Switch™, Xbox™ and the Epic Games Store™.  

Cross-play and cross-progression also means you’ll now be able to form a party with your friends regardless of the platform they're playing on! 

With so much to announce,  it really is best to head over to our info-packed blog to get the full scoop on this massive announcement! 

Here's the Free for All Announcement blog: https://fallguys.com/news/fall-guys-is-going-free-on-june-21-launching-on-playstation-nintendo-switch-xbox-and-the-epic-games-store

For more details visit https://www.epicgames.com/fallguys/en-US/free-for-all-pre-registration

#FallGuys #FallGuysFreeForAll
